rooms.description: Bohemian styled entrance hall with local artisan finishes and handcrafted decor that reflect traditional Indian aesthetics.
Open living area with vibrant colors, eclectic furniture pieces, local textiles; oriented east to welcome morning sunlight.
Cozy dining space adjoining the kitchen. Designed in bohemian style using reclaimed wood and vintage decor.
Functional and spacious open-plan kitchen with local stone finishes and sustainable practices, ensuring a central cooking hub.
Bohemian themed guest room with natural light and traditional Indian motifs. Incorporates local building norms with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Master bedroom in the Bohemian style, spacious, with a balcony to enjoy morning sunlight, following Vastu guidelines.
Bathroom adjacent to guest room with natural stone finishes and traditional Indian aesthetic touches.
Additional bedroom designed in Bohemian style, ensuring privacy and comfort using local materials.
Dedicated home office integrated into the farmhouse design with functional layout, ergonomic furniture, and bohemian decor. Positioned to maintain good Vastu alignment.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance door designed in a traditional style, providing access from the central courtyard.
Multiple openings leading into the central courtyard, ensuring natural ventilation and light.
Balconies and windows strategically placed to maximize sunlight and air circulation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Access route from the penthouse to the swimming pool area, designed with safety features and aesthetic alignment.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard acting as a communal space for relaxation and social gatherings. Incorporates local greenery, water features following Vastu principles.
